feed.title: go-proxy Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for go-proxy: v0.5.7
entry.content:
What's changed

  • Fixed container being excluded when it shouldn't
  • Fixed incorrect port / scheme assignment
  • Fixed missing subject in error message
  • Changed default wake_timeout to 30 seconds
  • Improved idlewatcher

Full Changelog: https://github.com/yusing/go-proxy/compare/0.5.6...0.5.7

entry.title: New release for go-proxy: v0.5.8
entry.content:
What's changed

  • Added linux/arm64, linux/armv7, linux/armv6 support
  • Added experimental middleware support f474ae4f7577477dc010b342c55db1b3bf5b00f4
  • Added match_domain option in config, check config.example.yml for more
  • Added custom error page support 90487bf
  • Added Configurable explicit only mode per docker provider: ONLY containers with alias(es) defined will be proxied 415f169f4894e0558d895c95e8aed3e49868b098
  • Changed labels should now work for snake_cases, camelCases and PascalCases, you may use whichever you like
  • Changed proxy.$<index>.<field> is now proxy.#<index>.<field>, $ still work for now but will be removed in future releases 345a4417a6d1083540bbe9d154d763403f67f4d2
  • Fixed go-proxy reload 90487bf
  • Fixed some containers being excluded on restart 91e7f4894a3940ecbf1dcde1413ad43eafe223de
  • Fixed go-proxy has label proxy.exclude by default, to prevent inifinite recursion causing memory leak
  • Improved some error messages (e.g. on connection failure, no matching domain/route)

Full Changelog: https://github.com/yusing/go-proxy/compare/0.5.7...0.5.8

entry.title: New release for go-proxy: v0.5.9
entry.content:
What's changed

  • Fixed container not being excluded on restart b38d7595a77faaf4ec787bae8d1f4e2667f5d818
  • Added real_ip and cloudflare_real_ip middlewares 860e914b9072c9734744679e707324d8191e60bc

Full Changelog: https://github.com/yusing/go-proxy/compare/0.5.8...0.5.9

entry.title: New release for go-proxy: v0.5.10
entry.content:
What's changed

  • Removed linux/armv6 linux/armv7 for now, will add it back when someone request
  • Changed now X-Forwarded headers are added by default (append to existing) ebedbc931f69992453279b4625a35fbad81895e0
  • Changed go-proxy ls-route now query api server first, then fallback to read from config file 9065d990e5da4f28000e1223c93b93274a1bfed8
  • Changed containers without port mapped should now serve a 404 or custom error page
  • Added hide_x_forwarded middleware ebedbc931f69992453279b4625a35fbad81895e0
  • Added cidr_whitelist middleware e8c3e4c75f9de448ae6e445aa6c10ef33ef27c4f
  • Added middleware compose support e951194bee8c89642bbbcb73402aff5d15d5cf7e 44cfd65f6c4d747ae2d725e2fd2c0c23d32e9bde ed887a5cfc4f0a2646cbf65e4b8d41cb61cd2012
  • Fixed routes not being loaded / updated in some scenerios
  • Fixed middleware implementation
  • Fixed route gone after container restart / rename aa162874475d8e8d8e97f3564cdb14b70e9558d6
  • Fixed API ef52ccb929159c5d64966ab3c7a3a8a28c023945

entry.title: New release for go-proxy: v0.5.11
entry.content:
What's changed

Changed labels with list values no longer have to starts with hyphen - Changed API host check will be disable when on debug mode (GOPROXY_DEBUG=true)
